name: Racing Heart
description:
As anxiety builds endlessly, it's all you can do to keep yourself going.

This game is an endless runner set on the line of a heart monitor, and as the heart rate increases, so does the difficulty.

This project was created as my Drawing I final at Fitchburg State University

NOTE: THIS GAME HAS NOT BEEN TESTED FOR OSX OR LINUX. IF YOU HAVE ISSUES RUNNING THE GAME ON OSX OR LINUX, PLEASE INFORM ME AND I WILL ATTEMPT TO SOLVE WHATEVER ISSUE YOU'RE HAVING.
